name: @aws-lambda/aws-serverless-express-handler
description: Handler for AWS Serverless Express (AWS Lambda)

scripts.test:unit: nyc --check-coverage --exclude tests --extension .ts --lines 90 --reporter=text --reporter=html ts-mocha --project ../../tsconfig.json --require tsconfig-paths/register --require source-map-support/register --recursive tests/**/*.ts
